scripts.install-all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.railway:build: npm run install-frontend && npm run build-frontend && npm run install-backend
scripts.build-frontend: cd frontend && npm run build:prod && mkdir -p ../backend/public && cp -r dist/pet-tracker/browser/* ../backend/public/ 2>/dev/null || (mkdir ..\backend\public 2>nul & xcopy dist\pet-tracker\browser\* ..\backend\public\ /E /I /Y 2>nul) || true
